code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./ForgotPassword.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UserForgotPassword(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();navigate("/UserPasswordReset",{state:{email}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forgot-password-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Forgot Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send Link"})]})]});}export default UserForgotPassword;
